owl:Ontology.dc:title: FAIR reviews ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: This vocabulary represents scientific reviews. This model is used to annotate http://fairreviews.linkeddata.es/ data.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between a review and a given rating assigned by a reviewer.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has rating

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a scientific contribution and the reviews issued for it.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has review

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a review the confidence set by the author about the review topic. As the review can be written only by one author the confidence is assumed to be for such author about the given paper without need of creating a new class involving the three actors in a n-ary alike solution.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has reviewer confidence

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between a given endeavour and the endeavour that it is replying to. For example, the relation between a reply and a given review.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is reply to

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between a review and the scientific contribution that is subject of the review.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is review of

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between a review and the tracking or scholarly venue management system where the reviewing process took place.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: issued at

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The realation between a review and the entity (e.g. conference, journal) that it was issued for (usually the one that requested the review).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: issued for

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The relation between the review and the agent publishing it. It might be the the author of the review or conference or journal to which the scientific resource was submitted to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: released by

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Confidence value of expertise in the review topic given by the reviwer
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: confidence value

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Numerical value of the rating given to a review.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: rating value

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Language of the scientific contribution (paper, review, etc.).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Language

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Un identificador que identifica de forma única a una entidad - tal como una agencia de financiación, una persona y un recurso - que pertenece a un esquema particular, como los especificados por individuos de la clase datacite:IdentifierScheme.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: identificador

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A non-empty group of Permissions and/or Prohibitions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Policy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The set of values of a given confidence scale.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Confidence concept

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A scale defining the confidence of a reviewer for a given topic.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Confidence concept scheme

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A venue (e.g. conference, workshop), a expression collection (e.g. journal, special issue), or an individual agent (e.g. organization, researcher) collecting scientific contributions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Convening organization

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A discrete scale defining the confidence of a reviewer for a given topic.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Discrete confidence concept scheme

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A discrete scale defining the rating given by a reviewer for a specific scientific contribution.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Discrete rating concept scheme

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The set of values of a given rating scale.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rating concept

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A scale defining the rating given by a reviewer for a specific scientific contribution.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rating concept scheme

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A reply to a review or another endeavour.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reply

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A review of a scientific contribution.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Review

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The platform where the review process takes place.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tracking system

owl:NamedIndividual.skos:definition: Discrete scale from Approved to Not Approved, including Aprproved With Reservations,
Discrete scale from Accept to Reject, including pre-screening and two strikes rule
Discrete scale from 1 to 5, used by Association for Computational Linguistics anual meetings
Not reviewer's area of expertise, or paper is very hard to understand. The evaluation is just an educated guess.
Reviewers is willing to defend my evaluation, but it is fairly likely that he/she missed some details, didn't understand some central points, or can't be sure about the novelty of the work.

Reviewer is pretty sure, but there's a chance he/she missed something. Although she/he has a good feel for this area in general, she/he did not carefully check the paper's details, e.g., the math, experimental design, or novelty.
Reviewer is quite sure, tried to check the important points carefully. It's unlikely, though conceivable, that he/she missed something that should affect his/her ratings.
Reviewer is positive that the evaluation is correct, has read the paper very carefully and is familiar with related work.
Discrete scale from Expert to Null, also representend in an scale from 4 to 0
Discrete scale from Strong Reject to Strong Accept, including Bordeline
Discrete scale from Strong Reject to Strong Accept, excluding Bordeline
owl:NamedIndividual.skos:prefLabel: St. Reject to St. Accept, without Borderline
